settings.heading: Lyttelton Lights Giving
settings.text:
We donate $1 from every purchase made in the Jeuneora online store to three charities that are very close to our hearts.

After you've made a purchase, you get to choose where the $1 goes or, if you're a subscriber, we'll automatically split the $1 from your purchase evenly between the charities.

We make payments to our nominated charities every 90 days.
